title: Strengthening Sustainable Supply Chain Management (SCM) Practical Competencies Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customized training for in-service professionals, applying experiential learning using food ecosystem case studies in COVID-19 crisis scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of designing sustainable SCM strategies using the ADDIE model
Learners can analyze SCM cases by applying the Triple Bottom Line (economic/social/environmental performance) framework
Learners can propose and implement SCM improvement plans linked to the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
In resource-constrained technical environments, learners can perform virtual simulations and collaborative activities using smartphones

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
